page.title: 05RECREATION SPORTS CENTRES
page.content: In our area there are various sports facilities ranging from sailing to skating. In the Hykeham area there is a sports centre called North Kesteven,where there are pitches for Rugby and soccer,a swimming pool,learner pool, tennis and squash courts,a hall used for karate and skating plus many other indoor sports. also a gymnasium,a cafe and bar. The comprehensive schools also have good facilities for all field sports athletics and basket ball. Ruston-Marconi is another popular sports centre with tennis courts, football pitches squash courts etc. Apart from the centres there other football pitches and bowling greens.
